name: Chen Tian 0001
content: Chen Tian ( NJU ) Home Publications Students Services Biography CitationMaster Chen Tian Professor Ph.D Advisor 国家杰出青年基金获得者 State Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology, School of Computer Science, Nanjing University. Email: tianchen AT nju DOT edu DOT cn Mailing address: Mailbox H008, School of Computer Science, Nanjing University, No.163 Xianlin Avenue, Nanjing, China, 210023 Current Research Interests Datacenter networking Distributed systems (especially machine learning systems and graph processing systems) Digital twins of digital systems Internet protocols Prospective Students I am looking for organized, motivated Students to work on a variety of exciting topics. We welcome candidates with solid background and strong interests in distributed systems. Capability of mathematical modeling/analysis and solid programming skills are even better. Please contact me by email with your CV. **News** [2025.07] Paper: BIAN accepted by SIGCOMM 2025. [2025.06] Paper: Sectric accepted by VLDB 2025. [2025.05] Paper: HotPrefix accepted by SIGMOD 2026.
